original_text: From there we put out to sea again and passed to the lee of Cyprus because the winds were against us.
korean_text: 또 거기서 우리가 떠나가다가 맞바람을 피하여 구브로 해안을 의지하고 항해하여

sentences.original_text: From there we put out to sea again
and passed to the lee of Cyprus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 키프로스의 바람 그늘 쪽으로 지나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: because the winds were against us
